meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Fern Potvin Mike Clark Jim Vichench Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1337.

td.p: Fern Potvin, a publishing executive from Teaneck, New Jersey
Mike Clark, a writer from Ventura, California
Jim Vichench, a railroad clerk from Brooklyn, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $5,800)

tr.td: THE 19TH CENTURY
[The "TH" was upper case and half the size of the 19.]
FANTASTIC FILMS
CATTLE
SPORTS NICKNAMES
ABBREV.
HINTS FROM HELOISE
